# Basic stuff

**bold text**  : 

    use asterics like this: **its bold**

***
    
__italic text__ : 

    use underscore like this: _its italic_

***
**_bold & italic_** : 
    
    use asterics and underscore **_bold&italic_**
***

**header**: use hash mark (the more the smaller the header become)

    #header
    ##header
    ###header
    ####header

***
**Links** : [Inline links](www.github.com) 

    [Visit GitHub!](www.github.com)
 
***   
**Links** : [Reference links][another place]

[another place]: www.github.com

     Here's [a link to something else][another place].
     Here's [yet another link][another-link].
     And now back to [the first link][another place].

     [another place]: www.github.com
     [another-link]: www.google.com

***
**Images** :  Inline image link with the titel _Benjamin Bannekat_               
              
    ![Benjamin Bannekat](https://octodex.github.com/images/bannekat.png
![Benjamin Bannekat](https://octodex.github.com/images/bannekat.png)


***
**Blockquotes** : Use this  sign in front of Text:
First you need to change *.css file and add:

    blockquote {
      background: #f9f9f9;
      border-left: 5px solid #ccc;
      margin: 1.5em 10px;
      padding: 0.5em 1.5em;
    }

than you can make blockquotes with this syntax:

    <blockquote>
    some bockquotes
    </blockquote>



<blockquote>
some bockquotes
</blockquote>


***

**Lists**: use asterics 

    * Milk
    * Eggs
    * Salmon
    * Butter

* Milk
* Eggs
* Salmon
* Butter
